Text:
This looks like it will solve my problems... at least, it would if it wasn't stuck at 60%. 

Seeding would be muchly appreciated.
Stuck at 85.4%. I so hope it's worth it! I don't get why so large file though...

I've already got the game installed, I manually updated it to 1.8.2  but My Sims 3 Characters won't walk? (Only use Taxis even for a foot away)? My characters in the Sims 3 won't walk anywhere, and they can't get into their house. I just started the game and these taxi's keep popping up. How can I stop this and let them just walk inside or around?? Or just play the game?

OK I'm following your instructions, excuse my brain fart here, but I went to HKEY_LOCALMACHINE/SOFTWARE/ and I don't see a folder that says Sims at all. Am I just thick as a plank or is it different in windows 7?

SEED PLEASE!!
I stuck at the 1.8.25 patch... It updated, but now the crack don't works... :C
Wow i had problem with this a month. Now i got it work becuase of you. Thanks !! Wonderful.
does this solve the "A file can not be found" problem when i run the patch ??

I'm back. Worked like a charm. I've played for a month with absolutely no problems, thank you very much. But now i'm back because a new patch came out and i can't use Awesomemod without patching the game(that's the only reason i'm patching the game) :(. I don't know how to patch it further. Whenever i try it says "invalid file found", probably because it's cracked. Conclusion : an update for this torrent would be awesome! Thanks.
wow .. it really worked!! Thaanks alot
it works great... really without any error and problem .. thnx hamham.. :D
